subject: TestSetup state
msgSnippet: I was wondering if anyone else has wanted to pass state info from a TestSetup Setup to the tests within the TestSuite it wraps?  If so, how did you accomplish
messageBody:
I was wondering if anyone else has wanted to pass state info from a
TestSetup Setup to the tests within the TestSuite it wraps? If so,
how did you accomplish it? It could be written to a file but that
seems less than optimal.

The perlunit guys are tackling passing state info around using a
runner object but they don't pass it to the setup/teardown routines.

Thanks for your help,
Kevin
